name: Backrooms Game
description:
I used scratch to code it because i'm too lazy to learn coding like javascript or c sharp

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Use F to drink Almond Water. (Restores HP and Sanity)

Press B to interact with People/Traders and the Exit

Press R to respawn

If you got any suggestions or complaints send trough either one of my emails

miguelvlogz310@gmail.com

robertyun63@gmail.com

I may or may not be able to respond to all of them depending on how much you send
